sqlquery.name: configquery.BaseOwnField.SelectAll
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( select c1 as BaseOwnFieldInfoID, C650000001 as BaseCategoryName, C650000002 as BaseCategorySchama, C650000003 as Base_field_ID, C650000004 as Base_field_DBName, C650000005 as Base_field_ShowName, C650000006 as Base_field_Type, C650000100 as BaseOwnFieldInfoDesc from {WF:Config_BaseOwnFieldInfo_Mobile} base where 1=1 $sch_schema$ ) $orderby$
